title: Studio Apartment
posting_body: ['$1200 / 500ft2 - Studio Apartment in Stratford (Stratford, Connecticut)', 'Studio Apartment in very well-maintained condominium complex in the center of Stratford.', 'Very short walk to train station, and the restaurants/bars of Stratford town center as well.', 'Secure building, with elevator, intercom system to buzz in guests, laundry facilities, and ample parking.', 'Yes cats are allowed, but not dogs.', 'Kitchen and Bathroom recently renovated.', 'Studio Apartment = large living room area, with separate bathroom, and separate kitchen, but no separate bedroom.', 'Nearly 500sf of space.', 'This condominium also features: Air conditioning, balcony, and plenty of storage.', 'No water bill and no heating bill to tenant, only rent, electricity and whatever cable/internet service is obtained.']
